services.name: Express Facial
services.description: A quick yet effective facial treatment perfect for busy schedules. Deep cleansing and instant refreshment in just 30 minutes.
services.fullDescription: Our Express Facial is designed for those seeking quick results without compromising quality. This treatment includes cleansing, exfoliation, and a customized mask to leave your skin refreshed and glowing.

services.name: Champagne Facial
services.description: Indulge in luxury with our Champagne Facial. Antioxidant-rich champagne extracts rejuvenate and brighten your complexion.
services.fullDescription: The Champagne Facial combines the power of antioxidants found in champagne with advanced skincare techniques. This luxurious treatment detoxifies, firms, and illuminates your skin for a youthful, radiant glow.

services.name: European Deep Pore Cleansing Facial
services.description: Deep cleansing treatment that purifies pores and removes impurities. Traditional European techniques for exceptionally clean skin.
services.fullDescription: Experience the time-honored European approach to skincare with our Deep Pore Cleansing Facial. This thorough treatment includes steam, extractions, and specialized masks to deeply purify and refine your skin.

services.name: Organic Facial
services.description: All-natural, organic skincare treatment using only the finest plant-based ingredients. Gentle yet effective for sensitive skin.
services.fullDescription: Our Organic Facial uses certified organic products free from harsh chemicals. This gentle treatment nourishes your skin with nature's finest ingredients while providing deep hydration and rejuvenation.

services.name: Cranberry & Pomegranate Facial
services.description: Antioxidant-rich facial featuring cranberry and pomegranate extracts. Fights free radicals and promotes youthful, radiant skin.
services.fullDescription: Harness the power of superfruits with our Cranberry & Pomegranate Facial. This antioxidant-rich treatment protects against environmental damage while brightening and revitalizing your complexion.

services.name: Sweet Mango Facial
services.description: Tropical treat for your skin! Vitamin-rich mango extracts nourish and hydrate for a glowing, healthy complexion.
services.fullDescription: Transport yourself to paradise with our Sweet Mango Facial. Rich in vitamins A, C, and E, this tropical treatment deeply nourishes and hydrates while leaving your skin soft, smooth, and radiant.
benefits: Rich in vitamins A, C, and E

services.name: Men's Facial
services.description: Specifically designed for men's skin. Addresses unique concerns like razor burn, large pores, and oil control.
services.fullDescription: Our Men's Facial is tailored to address the specific needs of male skin. This treatment focuses on deep cleansing, soothing razor irritation, controlling oil, and refining pores for healthy, clear skin.

services.name: Detox Facial
services.description: Purifying treatment that draws out toxins and impurities. Perfect for congested, stressed, or urban-exposed skin.
services.fullDescription: Our Detox Facial uses activated charcoal and detoxifying clay masks to deeply cleanse and purify. This treatment eliminates environmental pollutants and toxins, leaving your skin refreshed and clear.

services.name: Turmeric Deep Pore Cleansing Facial
services.description: Anti-inflammatory turmeric combined with deep pore cleansing. Reduces redness, calms irritation, and purifies skin.
services.fullDescription: Harness the healing power of turmeric in this specialized facial. Known for its anti-inflammatory and antibacterial properties, turmeric brightens, evens skin tone, and deeply cleanses pores.

services.name: Papaya Pumpkin Deep Pore Cleansing Facial
services.description: Enzymatic exfoliation with papaya and pumpkin. Gently removes dead skin while deeply cleansing pores for smooth, radiant skin.
services.fullDescription: This enzyme-rich facial combines papaya and pumpkin to gently dissolve dead skin cells and impurities. The natural enzymes and vitamins provide gentle exfoliation and deep pore cleansing for all skin types.

services.name: Collagen Glow Facial
services.description: Boost your skin's collagen production for firmer, plumper skin. Anti-aging treatment that restores youthful radiance.
services.fullDescription: Our Collagen Glow Facial uses advanced collagen-boosting ingredients to improve skin elasticity and firmness. This anti-aging treatment reduces fine lines and restores a youthful, glowing complexion.

services.name: Luxurious Facial
services.description: Ultimate pampering experience with premium products and extended treatment time. Complete rejuvenation for body and soul.
services.fullDescription: Indulge in our signature Luxurious Facial, an extended treatment featuring the finest skincare products and techniques. This comprehensive facial includes massage, masks, serums, and specialized treatments for ultimate relaxation and visible results.

services.name: Oxygen Facial
services.description: Revitalizing oxygen therapy that breathes new life into tired, dull skin. Instantly brightens and rejuvenates complexion.
services.fullDescription: Experience the power of pure oxygen with our Oxygen Facial. This innovative treatment infuses oxygen, vitamins, and nutrients deep into the skin, promoting cell renewal and leaving you with a radiant, youthful glow.

services.name: 24 Karat Facial
services.description: Luxurious 24K gold-infused facial for ultimate anti-aging. Gold particles stimulate circulation and promote youthful radiance.
services.fullDescription: Treat yourself to the ultimate luxury with our 24 Karat Facial. Real gold particles improve blood circulation, stimulate cellular regeneration, and provide powerful anti-aging benefits for luminous, youthful skin.

services.name: Acne Facial
services.description: Specialized treatment for acne-prone skin. Deep cleansing, extractions, and targeted treatments to clear breakouts and prevent future ones.
services.fullDescription: Our Acne Facial is specifically designed to treat and prevent breakouts. This comprehensive treatment includes deep cleansing, professional extractions, antibacterial masks, and specialized serums to clear existing acne and prevent future blemishes.

services.name: Dermaplaning Facial
services.description: Advanced exfoliation technique that removes dead skin and peach fuzz. Reveals smooth, glowing skin with improved product absorption.
services.fullDescription: Dermaplaning is a medical-grade exfoliation technique using a surgical blade to gently remove the top layer of dead skin cells and vellus hair. The result is incredibly smooth, radiant skin with improved makeup application and skincare absorption.

services.name: Anti-Aging Facial
services.description: Comprehensive anti-aging treatment targeting fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of firmness. Advanced techniques for visible rejuvenation.
services.fullDescription: Our Anti-Aging Facial combines cutting-edge ingredients and techniques to combat visible signs of aging. This treatment focuses on boosting collagen, improving elasticity, and reducing fine lines and wrinkles for noticeably younger-looking skin.

services.name: Hydra Facial
services.description: Medical-grade hydradermabrasion treatment. Deep cleansing, exfoliation, extraction, and intense hydration in one powerful treatment.
services.fullDescription: The Hydra Facial is a revolutionary treatment that combines cleansing, exfoliation, extraction, hydration, and antioxidant protection. This non-invasive procedure delivers immediate, visible results with no downtime.

services.name: Micro - Dermabrasion Facial
services.description: Professional microdermabrasion treatment that resurfaces skin. Reduces fine lines, scars, and hyperpigmentation for smoother texture.
services.fullDescription: Microdermabrasion is a non-invasive procedure that uses fine crystals or a diamond-tipped wand to exfoliate the skin's surface. This treatment effectively reduces the appearance of fine lines, age spots, acne scars, and uneven texture.

services.name: Oxygen-Hydra Facial
services.description: Ultimate combination of oxygen therapy and hydradermabrasion. Maximum hydration, brightening, and rejuvenation in one treatment.
services.fullDescription: Experience the best of both worlds with our Oxygen-Hydra Facial. This premium treatment combines the cleansing power of hydradermabrasion with oxygen infusion therapy for unparalleled results and radiant, youthful skin.

services.name: Micro-Needling
services.description: Advanced collagen induction therapy using micro-needles. Dramatically improves scars, wrinkles, and overall skin texture.
services.fullDescription: Micro-needling is a minimally invasive procedure that creates controlled micro-injuries to stimulate your body's natural wound healing process. This treatment boosts collagen and elastin production for significant improvement in skin texture, tone, and firmness.
